messages.msgSnippet: ... I have saved it to my desktop. I also lit 4 real candles and some incense. I will keep Hannah, Diana and Hayden in my thoughts today. I will send as much
messages.messageBody:
>>I have lit a candle and invite you to see it.>>

I have saved it to my desktop. I also lit 4 real candles and some incense. I will keep Hannah, Diana and Hayden in my thoughts today. I will send as much healing energy into the Universe as I can muster.

I wish I could do more.

--
~Mary

"The miracle is not to walk on water. The miracle is to walk on the
green earth, dwelling deeply in the present moment and feeling truly
alive."
~Thich Nhat Hanh

From: "dragteine@..." <dragteine@...>
